The show begins with an audition in New York and then heads to New Orleans before performances in Hollywood and a live show in Las Vegas, with the finalists being named in Los Angeles on March 3.

Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410. I'm going to try to put on a great show for the fans, Michael Vick said. In the past, Michael Vick 's running is largely what got him into the Pro Bowl. He takes satisfaction that his passing was better than it has ever been this season.

is just getting under way. The vehicles from the new minivan platform would be built in Windsor. "I am here with one message to tell you," Sergio Marchionne told workers Tuesday. The future of this plant is without doubt guaranteed. Windsor Assembly is Chrysler's oldest plant and the only automaking factory in North America running on three shifts. The actress plays mean cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the hit musical series, and says she can see similarities between her on-screen role and the pop mogul. If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell , Jane Lynch explains. "You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her.
